definition: to scrub with an abrasive/to sand/frosted (e.g. glass)
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist

sentences.english: Combination oiled nubuck leather upper with textile fabric accents.
sentences.chinese: 结合上油纺织面料口音磨砂皮革鞋面。

sentences.english: It now features Onyx Nubuck leather highlighted in orange.
sentences.chinese: 现在它的功能玛瑙磨砂皮革中强调橙色。

sentences.english: Frosted slides are sandblasted for marking specimens.
sentences.chinese: 磨砂的载玻片经喷砂处理以标记标本。

sentences.english: Plush leather, matte-finish tactile buttons: quality craftsmanship.
sentences.chinese: 舒适豪华的皮革，磨砂触觉按钮:高品质工艺。

sentences.english: "SUN" brand dry sanding paper(P120-P600) are used for furniture finishing and processing painted surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 太阳牌干磨砂纸适用于家具油漆等。

sentences.english: The bathroom can use ground glass or PS board, pervious to light do not show content more appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 浴室可以用磨砂玻璃或PS板，透光不透物比较适宜。

sentences.english: In the thicket he found only frosted leaves and green stalks coated with snowflakes and ice.
sentences.chinese: 在灌木丛，他发现有磨砂绿茎叶和涂有雪花和冰。

sentences.english: The processing techniques and key technical points for making buffalo nubuck upholstery were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了水牛磨砂沙发革的加工工艺及技术措施。

sentences.english: Matte-leather upper with an ultra-feminine collar.
sentences.chinese: 磨砂皮革鞋面超女性化的领。

sentences.english: High quality non-magnetic extra-thick frosted stainless steel casing, elegant and durable.
sentences.chinese: 优质不带磁加厚磨砂不锈钢外壳，典雅耐用。

sentences.english: Nubuck upper with mesh overlays for added breathability.
sentences.chinese: 磨砂鞋面以增加透气性的网状覆盖。

sentences.english: When washing bath, make the whole body grind with thick bath salt first arenaceous , disinfect clean body.
sentences.chinese: 洗浴时，先用粗浴盐作全身磨砂，消毒净身。

sentences.english: Features nubuck leather upper for a feminine and natural look.
sentences.chinese: 特色磨砂皮革鞋面一个女性和自然的外观。

sentences.english: Scrub and spray watercolors to create interesting textures.
sentences.chinese: 磨砂和喷雾水彩创建有趣的纹理。

sentences.english: As a foundation: sponge on dry, over daytime moisturizer, for a soft matte effect.
sentences.chinese: 用干海绵涂抹，白天保湿，表现为软磨砂效果。

definition: texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
outer skin/surface/leather cover (of a book)/drum skin/leather upper (of a shoe)
acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
